channel.title: 508 Maps
channel.description: I am trying to add 508 maps and I am not a client sided coder but, where do I add the new maps? Which folder in the cache do I put them? EDIT: I added them to my frames folder in the cache and I get this run error: [code]Map Amount: 1226 Error: loaderror Loading ServerName... 60[/code]

item.title: 508 Maps
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

I wouldn’t know but there have been quite a few good programmer who have tried to implement it but theres far too many bugs that occur when this happens for just one person to handle. So if your doing it on your own i wouldn’t reccomend it.

Read full topic
